name: 劉宗瑜
objective:
1. 軟體特性與軟體系統演化
2. 整體規劃
3. 系統需求分析
4. 系統設計方法
5. 程式設計方法
6. 軟體測試
7. 軟體維護
8. 專案管理
9. 品質管理
schedule:
week1. An Overview of Software Engineering

week2. Software Processes

week3. Requirements Engineering

week4. Software Design

week5. Object-oriented Software Development

week6. Software Testing

week7. Software Project Management and Planning 

week8. Software Quality Assurance 

week9. Software Maintenance

week10. Formal Methods and Software Engineering 

week11. Advanced Topics in Software Engineering
scorePolicy:
Attendance : 20%
Homeworks and assignments : 20%
First mid-term examination : 30%
Term final examination : 30%
materials:
課本: 

Roger S. Pressman. Software Engineering: a practitioner’s approach, 6th edition. McGRAW-HILL.（中譯版 滄海書局）


參考書:

Ian Sommerville. Software Engineering, 7th edition. Addison Wesley.
